mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (reply_seq, reply_boardname, reply_boardseq, reply_content, reply_writer, reply_regdate) select case count(*) when 0 then 1 else max(reply_seq) + 1 end,'freeboard', #{reply_boardseq}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_writer}, now() from tbl_reply
mapper.select: SELECT TR.* , (SELECT TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_USER TU WHERE TU.USER_ID = TR.REPLY_WRITER) REPLY_NICKNAME FROM TBL_REPLY TR WHERE TR.REPLY_SEQ = #{reply_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_updatedate = now() WHERE reply_seq = #{reply_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT TR.* , (SELECT TU.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_USER TU WHERE TU.USER_ID = TR.REPLY_WRITER) REPLY_NICKNAME FROM TBL_REPLY TR WHERE TR.REPLY_BOARDSEQ = #{free_seq} ORDER BY TR.REPLY_SEQ DESC
